tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Akugbe
programme.desc: Odiase wins a wrestling contest and the king bless him bountifully with a land, including handing him his sister. Will it change Odiase?

programme.title: First Wife
programme.desc: The hate mama has for her twin sister Martha is overwhelming. She stands in for her and accepts her bride price, now she is hell bent on marrying her sisters husband.

programme.title: Bachelor Life
programme.desc: Emeka and Nwakaego live a fake life, deceiving each other in love, but the truth is about to come to the open as things start falling apart.

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: A young man get his fathers wife pregnant, and they both keep it a secret just to take all his inheritance.

programme.title: The Dynasty
programme.desc: Obi swears never to forgive his father when he lost his mom 15 years ago, now he must look away from the past and save his father from the clutching arms of Mariam.

programme.title: Ant Infested Firewood
programme.desc: Obinna breaks his wifes heart when he throws her and their daughters out because of another woman, Ifeoma. He gets her pregnant and the manipulation begins.

programme.title: Exchange For Love
programme.desc: Amadi the Onowu of a kingdom will do anything to ascend the throne, even if it means killing the crowned prince. But the princes goodwill is about to save him from the disaster ahead.

programme.title: Ugomma
programme.desc: Amadi falls in love with an herbalist daughter, but everything is about to change as he has to visit the evil forest to get herbs for Ugommas father to stay alive.

programme.title: Smoke And Mirrors
programme.desc: Rooted in culture, AfricaMagic Epic is a channel dedicated to African programming made by Africans and features the best of epic entertainment content from the continent.

programme.title: The Dead Mans Name
programme.desc: In a village, the tradition dictates that once a woman loses her husband, she cannot marry another man. Yolan is bound by this custom, destined to remain unmarried until her death.

programme.title: Twin Disaster
programme.desc: Wendy selflessly offers to surrogate for her twin, Linda, to help her start a family. However, Wendys reproductive health suffers after carrying a child for her sister.

programme.title: Marriage Security
programme.desc: Obiageli wants a good life for herself and decides to trade the happiness of her daughters. Now, she must pay the price of greed.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoyes joy is short-lived. Even in defeat, Ijeawele still finds ways to rile Akuada up while Adanna tries to figure out who the mystery man is.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye reunites with Adanna, Nnanna faces Urennas courage.

programme.title: Female Wolves
programme.desc: Chika sees hell in the hands of her friends and decides to go another route and leads a pack of female wolves that crushes everything in their path.

programme.title: Permitted Sin
programme.desc: Austin and his wife creates sweet memories and makes endless promises to each other, but will his wife betray his love when everything gets though?

programme.title: What Love Cost Me
programme.desc: After Juliana gives all for Gregory, dumps her to frolic with Calister, his boss, this makes Juliana angry and makes her find her true self.

programme.title: Ritual Of Vengeance
programme.desc: Chris mother and a friend conspire to kill Ifunanya, a young girl, so the ghost will always frustrate Chris. Until a confession is made, Chris will never encounter success.

programme.title: The Encoded
programme.desc: Chief meet Rose, cleans her up and she becomes his concubine. Rose sought attention from chief but didnt get any. Will this continue after she meets Arnold?

programme.title: When Love Hurts
programme.desc: Rooted in culture, AfricaMagic Epic is a channel dedicated to African programming made by Africans and features the best of epic entertainment content from the continent.

programme.title: Love Lives On
programme.desc: A couple are in shock when they learn their child is not theirs, this news stirs up a new phase, revealing many untold stories.

programme.title: Wife In House
programme.desc: Smart finds himself entangled in the affections of two women, deeply loving them both and willing to go to great lengths to maintain their relationships simultaneously.

programme.title: Desolate
programme.desc: Two friends vow to always have each others backs from when they were teenagers. However, Kate struggles to maintain the relationship, as its becoming a little torn in her flesh.

programme.title: Enakhe
programme.desc: Ejiro is interrogated and punished. GM loses patience with Archie. And the table headship changes yet again.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Kingsley comes face to face with Mausi as Senami is attacked. Obi gets through to Folake.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Stukkie and Shandu are finally married and now the celebration begins at the reception. Sli confronts Thando, causing Thando to lose an ally.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Tejiri decides to surprise Jite again by changing her dress sense but she doesnt get the desired reaction..

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: The tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: Isibaya
programme.desc: A major story breaks in the newspaper, turning events upside down and changing everything.

programme.title: The Johnsons
programme.desc: A family sitcom that focus on an average family based in Lagos Nigeria, their diverse traits and how they cope with what life has to offer them

programme.title: Ajoche
programme.desc: Revenge, war, duty, honor, love and lust are the order of the day, as the people of Ocholuje must learn to survive when they uncover some bitter truths.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Donatus attempts to frustrate Mimi, but she stands her ground and fights back with resilience.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: Angela has a clash of wills with Masters. Laide gets in deeper with the fake agents. Chuks agrees to help Dalyn take care of his uncle

programme.title: Greed And Desire
programme.desc: Thakane introduces the staff to their new boss. Mapule is disturbed when she learns what Zondo wants, in exchange of dropping the charges.

programme.title: Unbroken
programme.desc: Jesse refuses to buy what Ademide is selling. Iyoma confronts Judge Adams. Tallulah makes Jeff a promise.

programme.title: Brethren
programme.desc: Oluso throws Bara and Bassey for another loop. Sir K keeps his own drama in check as Dag realizes hes in more trouble.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: A situational comedy documenting the lives of four friends who share an apartment. All sorts of chaotic and hilarious things happen as they go about their daily escapades

programme.title: Trouble Girlfriend
programme.desc: A village champion, Monica is battling a princess of a land for a man. Who wins him over in this drama that is full of suspense and humor.

programme.title: Love Come Back
programme.desc: Its not easy saying Im sorry but with a beautiful surprise and help from the Love Come Back team, getting your love back might not be that hard after all.

programme.title: Crazy Kind Of Love
programme.desc: A rich American base returnee is crazily in love with a younger spinster who finds him unattractive as she believes true love cannot be found where it does not exist or stay.

programme.title: Tasty Cube Food Arena
programme.desc: A delightful culinary show where celebrities showcase their cooking skills and create delicious meals using natures best ingredients and Tasty Cubes unique flavors.

programme.title: The Real Housewives Of Lagos
programme.desc: At the Epe getaway, tensions rise as Dr. Rommel shades Faith to Tiannah. Faith apologizes to Iyabo, but her bond with Dr. Rommel turns ice cold.

programme.title: Recipe For Success
programme.desc: Bisola Aiyeola hosts mothers and daughters in genuine conversations on money, dreams, and life lessons, all while bonding over the preparation of their favourite meals.

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After moving to a new apartment, two young couple share an unpleasant experience from the hands of their psychotic new neighbor, who would stop at nothing to sever their bond.

programme.title: De9jaspirit Talent Hunt
programme.desc: A thrilling reality show where entertainers of all ages, including singers, dancers, comedians, magicians, and more, display their talents before a panel of celebrity judges.

programme.title: Date My Family Nigeria
programme.desc: The ultimate romantic adventure where a bachelor or bachelorette embark on a quest to find the one, visiting the homes of three families of the opposite gender to make a choice.

programme.title: Comedy Nites
programme.desc: Laugh after laugh, you want to take a bathroom break before we get started- Its that good. Its a half hour of side-splitting Stand-up comedy from a range of comedians.

programme.title: Style Magnate
programme.desc: In a star-studded grand finale, the designers present their final collections to a room filled with celebrities, peers, and fashion elites. Who will be crowned the ultimate Style Magnate?

programme.title: Just Like Rainbow
programme.desc: Lucas clings to the few reminders he has of his vanished past, but a startling revelation shows that not everything was lost in the haunting accident.

programme.title: My Uncle My Pain
programme.desc: Okolo frustrated his brother and his family because of a piece of land, his brother Nduka and the son died in the process. This suspense filled movie exposes the evil in men.

programme.desc: In 1980, a teen goes for a run around her hometown in Maine. Days later, her savagely beaten body is found. Police re-examine the case when her mum intervenes.

programme.title: Murder In The Heartland
programme.desc: When a father goes missing, the small town of Challis, Idaho, is abuzz with gossip, leaving investigators to decipher what is fact and what is fiction.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: A Sunday school teacher is convicted of murdering her husband by poisoning his sports drink. Will Chris and Melissa find new evidence to prove her innocence?

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In 2008, Ryan Widmer was convicted of murdering his new wife, Sarah, but he swears hes not guilty. Chris and Fatima investigate the evidence to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Disappeared

programme.desc: TV news anchorwoman Marisa Burke and her husband Mark Kandel become the eye of a media storm when Marks twisted double life starts making headlines.

programme.desc: When a colonels wife discovers her husbands startling double life, she must choose between her own future and the good of the US military.

programme.desc: On June 6, 1992, Suzie Streeter and Stacy McCall are out celebrating high school graduation. By morning, the teens are missing, along with Suzies mother.

programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from a reptilian foe.

programme.desc: Seeking a runaway teenager as a favour, a detective ends up held hostage by an unlikely gang of would-be bank robbers.

programme.desc: A washed-up drunk claiming to be a powerless alien hero joins a teenage reporter to battle a ruthless drug lord and uncover the truth about his past.
